name: LoadOut
tag_list: humanitarian, productivity, agriculture, industrial, control, mobile, international
overview: LoadOut develops solutions that improve lives by providing people with functional, interactive, and practical technology solutions. Our passion to positively impact hard working people has touched agriculture, education, industrial control, human development, and an array of other sectors that span every continent on Earth. LoadOut collaborates with small businesses, multi-national companies, NGO’s, media organizations, universities, governments, & other entities to deploy pioneering software and hardware. These solutions influence learning, efficiency, news, and productivity while placing the focus on empowering human innovation.
